title: Mango crumble
ingredients: ['For the topping', '65g plain flour', '70g quick-cooking or old-fashioned oats', '120g packed brown sugar', '1⁄4 teaspoon grated nutmeg', '2 tablespoons finely chopped crystallized ginger', '75g cold butter', 'For the fruit', '3L sliced ripe mango (about 3–4 mangoes, depending on size)', '1 1⁄2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice', '45g packed brown sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour']
